import React from 'react' import '../bootstrap.min.css' import '../css/home.css' import {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import img1 from '../assets/img1.jfif' export const Home=()=>{ const navigate=useNavigate() const [title,setTitle]=useState("") const[datas,setDatas]=useState([]) const[details,setDetails]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:5000/profile/getAllPosts").then((res)=>{ setDatas(res.data.msg) }) },[]) const search=()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:5000/search/title/:title").then((res)=>{ setDetails(res.data.msg) }) } return(


Photos World



setTitle(e.target.value)}>




{datas.map((x,index)=>


Title : {x.Title}

Category : {x.Category}

Posted By : {x.PostedBy}

Posted Date : {x.PostedDate}



)}
) }
